page.title: 16 Beccles Adults Societies.
page.content: For such a small town Beccles has an amazing number of clubs and organisations.There are well over 100 and vary from philately,the arts, light opera to cage birds,horticulture and weight watching. There is also a vast amount of sport available with a Sports Centre and Gym Club. For the Handicapped there is The May Centre and The Welfare Vehicle Trust. Beccles has teams for football,cricket rugby and hockey,as well as swimming and darts. There is a Save The Children Fund Group and many other popular clubs. Full details of all these and many others may be obtained at the Library in Blyburgate.
